title: Petrified Forest National Park: Off the Beaten Path
body: Off the Beaten Path       Get off the road. Get off the paved trail. Go for an adventure.  The following are suggested routes, not trails. Route finding skills will be used and distances are approximate.          NPS  Billings Gap Overlook Hike (pdf 1303 kb) 3 miles (4.8 km) round trip          NPS  Blue Forest Hike (pdf 9653 kb) 1.5 miles (2.4 km) one-way (that is 1.2 miles Off the Beaten Path + 0.3 miles on Blue Mesa Loop Trail) To make a one-way trip, you will need to set up a shuttle previous to hiking. Or turn-around and retrace your steps for a 2.4 mile (3.9 km) round trip.          NPS  Jasper Forest Hike (pdf 2866 kb) 2.5 miles (4 km) round trip          NPS  Martha's Butte Hike 2 miles (3.2 km) round trip          NPS  Onyx Bridge Hike (pdf 1539 kb) 4 miles (6.4 km) round trip          NPS  Red Basin/Clam Beds Hike (pdf 2721 kb) 8.5 miles (13.7 km) round trip          First Forest Point Hike NPS  First Forest Point Hike (pdf 2947 KB) 2.1 miles (3.4 km) round trip         NPS  Devil's Playground Three permits are available each week on a first-come-first-serve basis. You may call the visitor center at 928 524-6228 x236 to find out the status of these permits. Permits cannot be set aside or saved. Please note that visitors take the access road to Devil's Playground at their own risk.
